# 23rd Army Corps (Russian Empire)

|allegiance=Imperial Russian Army
|battles =
*World War I
**Battle of Tannenberg
**Battle of Łódź (1914)
**Battle of the Vistula River
}}
The 23rd Army Corps was an Army corps in the Imperial Russian Army.
Composition
*3rd Guards Infantry Division
*2nd Infantry Division
Part of
*2nd Army: 1914
*5th Army: 1914 – 1915
*8th Army: 1915
*1st Army: 1915
*13th Army: 1915
*3rd Army: 1915
*5th Army: 1916
*11th Army: 1916
*8th Army: 1916
*9th Army: 1916
*8th Army: 1916 – 1917
Commanders
*August 15, 1913 - August 30, 1914: Kyprian Kandratovich
*August 30 - November 1914: Vladimir Danilov
*December 28, 1914 - July 1, 1915: Vladimir Apollonovich Olokhov
*September 1915: Nikolai Tretyakov
*1916-1917: Eduard Ekk
*April 1917: Mikhail Promtov
*September 1917: Vasily Kirey
External links
* [https://web.archive.org/web/20031204135742/http://home.comcast.net/~markconrad/RUSS1914.html Russian Army, 1914]
* [http://regiment.ru/upr/B/2/AK/23.htm 23 Korpus Armijny na Regiment.ru]
